name: Totem Destroyer
description:
In an ancient prophecy, it was said about a magical totem in the form of a golden cat that should never be touched, and it's up to you to save the world from the damned prediction and save the totem so that nothing bad happens!

Totem Destroyer - A game in the physical world where the player has to destroy wooden objects while keeping the totem above the fire, preventing it from approaching the flames.

Game Features:
- Pixel Art
- Difficulty
- Physical World
